messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS FOR VOTE FOR ROB WILSON
messages.content: Rob Wilson's leaflet lists three reasons to vote for him, related to the NHS, crime fighting, and improving education. It suggests outcomes, a crackdown on crime, and raising the bar in education respectively.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Rob commits to measurable and positive results in healthcare by cutting red tape and improving local health services for all.
Rob promises a crackdown on crime, to protect citizens from violent crimes and antisocial behavior by putting police on the streets.
Rob aims to improve standards of schools, raising teaching standards and encouraging a 'Reading renaissance' through responsibility in education.

issues.education: Rob Wilson intends to improve education by raising school standards through encouraging responsibility in education.
issues.health: Promises tangible improvements in healthcare by reducing bureaucracy and making positive local health service changes.

contactInformation.address: 12a South View Park, Marsack Street, Reading RG4 5AF

images.caption: Photos showing Rob Wilson and his team campaigning and engaging with the community in various activities and highlighting past successes.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes visuals of Rob Wilson's involvement in the community, past campaign successes, and emphasizes the importance of voting for him for a 'brighter future' in Reading East.
